question: Which country's history is narrated through the "Saga of the Greenlanders"?
explanation: Iceland's history is narrated through the "Saga of the Greenlanders". It is one of the sagas of Icelanders. Along with Saga of Erik the Red, it is one of the two main literary sources of information for the Norse exploration of North America. It relates to the colonization of Greenland by Erik the Red and his followers.
